title: The St Arnaud boys
creator_credit: Norm Michael, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Norm started his life in the Army with six other local boys from his local area. He really enjoyed the mateship and sense of community he shared with them, and reminisces on the good times they had over the years. The mateship still lives on today when Norm catches up with them back in their home town, St Arnaud.
